name: Ecommerce Web Application
description: A modern, high-performance online store with a sleek, responsive design for a seamless shopping experience on any device. Built using NextJS, ReactJS, TailwindCSS, Sanity, and Stripe for efficient and secure transactions.

name: Afroboost
description: Revived and enhanced Afroboost, an application showcasing African artists and entrepreneurs. Updated dependencies, added payment methods, online coaching, attendance, and meeting features. Deployed on a VPS server with Nginx. Worked on full-stack development using MySQL for the backend and ReactJS for the front end.

name: Netflix Clone
description: Developed a Netflix Clone with a user-friendly interface, secure payment integration, and real-time database. Features include user authentication and a responsive design. Created this project to learn and master Typescript, enhance ReactJS and TailwindCSS skills, and explore Firebase integration.

name: Deliveroo Clone
description: Developed a Deliveroo Clone for food delivery with a sleek interface and real-time updates. Built with React Native and TailwindCSS, featuring a backend powered by Sanity. Created this project to learn and master React Native.

name: Ecommerce website
description: Developed an ecommerce website from scratch using WooCommerce and WordPress. Responsible for maintenance and deployment on managed hosting, featuring a user-friendly interface and integrated contact form for seamless customer interaction.

name: React Calculator
description: Built a React Calculator to master state management with Redux. Features a responsive design and efficient state handling for smooth calculations.

name: Admin Dashboard
description: Developed an admin dashboard for user verification and management. Features include data display, user verification, and the ability to block/unblock users.
